thread.title: TV | Olive Kitteridge

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Olive Kitteridge
text: Second part of this Emmy winning series tonight which tells the story of life in a New England town over the course of 25 years through the eyes of Maths teacher, Olive Kitteridge. Things go a bit mental for poor Olive and Henry tonight as they find themselves taken hostage by armed robbers in a hospital emergency room. We'll assume that it all works out okay though as we know Olive finds herself forming an unexpected bond with a widower, who is none other than the legendary Bill Murray himself, a role which has also landed him an Emmy win.
